info.title: Product
info.description: Access and manage all information of the product such as product ID, product description, base unit of measure, product category ID and usage. Disclaimer: The list of entity type collections displayed under API References is not complete. To view the comprehensive list, see the service metadata.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

--request-separator

--request-separator--
